subject: Communication
title: The Medium Is the Message
description: Learn The Medium Is the Message in one minute.

hook.text: Marshall McLuhan said the light bulb is a medium with no content. Yet it changed how civilization works.

buildup.text: McLuhan argued that the format of a medium shapes society more than any content it carries.

discovery.text: TV didn't just deliver news â€” it created a visual culture. The internet didn't just share information â€” it created.

twist.text: We focus on what's said on social media. McLuhan would say the real impact is how social media restructured attention.

climax.text: Media literacy starts here: understanding that the tools we consume through actively reshape how we think, feel, and.

punchline.text: Don't just watch what's on the screen. Watch what the screen is doing to you.

quiz.question: What did Marshall McLuhan mean by 'the medium is the message'?
options: The format of media shapes society more than its content
